title: Can you help me ID this font
content:
I need a font identical or similar to the pic posted below, I’m considering having it constructed out of light bulbs and photographed so this font is perfect. Any suggestions would be welcome, have wasted hours looking through old font books already.

[http://www.diamondhoohamen.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210160906/http:/www.diamondhoohamen.com/ "http://www.diamondhoohamen.com/")

 [‹ (x) Beautiful italic sans on J Kaczmarek website - Omnes {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210160906/http:/typophile.com/node/41753 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please ID this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210160906/http:/typophile.com/node/41796 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fumanchu

comments.content: Wow! that was quick!! thanks for the ID you have saved me loads of time.
